attributes.action: Stop vaccine / covid passports being introduced in NI
attributes.additional_details: Covid passports are being proposed in NI. These passes have not been shown to produce any significant impact on covid transmission in many countries where they have been adopted. They also have the potential to be discriminatory and divisive and should be challenged as an abuse of governmental powers. Covid passports must be rejected.
attributes.background: Stop covid / vaccine passports being introduced in NI.

rejection.details:
Decisions relating to covid-19 restrictions in Northern Ireland are a matter for the Northern Ireland Executive, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You might like to contact your local MLA who represents you, and ask them to raise this issue with the Executive on your behalf. You can find your MLA's contact details here: http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/your-mlas/locate-your-mla2/
